description:
FREE CALLING + TEXTING APP for both the US and Canada.
Choose your own local number for FREE.  Others force some random number on you and make you pay for it!

REAL PHONE NUMBER INCLUDED 
Get your own real phone number that you can use to call and text any phone number, including landlines, in the US and Canada, even if you don’t have a calling plan. Your friends don’t need Textfree to receive -- they don’t even need to have a smartphone.

TEXTING IS UNLIMITED; EARN MINUTES FOR FREE OUTBOUND CALLS 
As always, texting is totally free and unlimited. Incoming calls are free. You get 10 free minutes to start, and then you earn minutes for additional free outbound calls. And if you run out of minutes, it's easy to buy super cheap minutes. 

TURN YOUR IPHONE, IPAD OR IPOD TOUCH INTO A FREE PHONE
Textfree turns your iPhone, iPad or iPod touch into a free phone with unlimited FREE texting to the US and 35 other countries. Incoming calls, and Pinger-to-Pinger calls are always free. Whoever said nothing in life is free hasn’t tried Textfree. 

CUSTOMIZATION WITH UNIQUE WALLPAPER FOR EVERY CONTACT 
Customize your text conversations with unique wallpapers for every person in your phone. You pick the picture, and we turn it into the background for your conversations. 

GREAT WHEN YOU’RE TRAVELING ABROAD 
Download Textfree and send free texts from anywhere in the world as long as you have a data connection. Find free WiFi at your hotel, a restaurant, even on a train. Why pay for expensive roaming charges when you can text for free!  For a list of 35 countries you can text to, visit: http://r.pinger.com/text-intl

BETTER THAN THOSE MESSENGER APPS 
• Messenger apps only work for text messages or calls between people using the app. And only when they have a smartphone. 
• Call or text your grandmother’s non-smartphone in Minneapolis--FREE. 
• Call a restaurant and make reservations--FREE. 
• Text a friend in Dallas or Toronto as much as you want--FREE. 

MORE THAN A MESSENGER 
When your friends have Textfree talking and texting gets even better. The calls are in HD, so they sound great. And you and your friends get unlimited free calls (talk as long as you like) and unlimited free texts (goodbye 160 character limit!) to and from one another, anywhere in the world. 

PACKED WITH ADDITIONAL FEATURES 
• Call or text for free back to the US and Canada from anywhere in the world when you have a data connection or WiFi 
• Facebook contact photo sync 
• One simple view for texts, calls and voicemails 
• Know the instant your texts are read 
• Customized voicemail 
• Block numbers, if needed 
• Log in securely from any device 
• Group addressing 
• Send hi-res pics 
• Choose from zillions of ringtones and text tones 
• Connect via Bluetooth if you’re on an iPhone 

OTHER IMPORTANT INFO 
• Emergency calls are not supported 
• Textfree is ad-supported, so you will see ads from time to time 
• When roaming, additional carrier data charges may apply. Contact your carrier for details.

CONNECT WITH US 
• facebook.com/pinger 
• twitter.com/pinger
trackCensoredName: Text Free: Free Calling App + Free Texting App with Textfree
trackName: Text Free: Free Calling App + Free Texting App with Textfree
